audioText: Le rapport des Nations Unies souligne que la pénurie d'eau potable menace des millions de vies, exacerbant les tensions géopolitiques dans plusieurs régions du monde.
question: According to the UN report, what is a major consequence of drinking water scarcity?
options: It leads to increased agricultural production.
It threatens millions of lives and exacerbates geopolitical tensions.
It promotes international cooperation on water management.
It has no significant global impact.
explanation: The text states: 'la pénurie d'eau potable menace des millions de vies, exacerbant les tensions géopolitiques dans plusieurs régions du monde.' (the scarcity of drinking water threatens millions of lives, exacerbating geopolitical tensions in several regions of the world.)
